means: 声称( assert的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: "Kathleen" was, as its 1892 subtitle asserted, "An Irish Drama".
sentence.Network_cn: 正如1892年剧本的副标题所强调的，《凯瑟琳》是一部“爱尔兰戏剧”。

sentence.Network_en: He asserted his dominance over the other party members.
sentence.Network_cn: 他坚持对其他党员的支配.

sentence.Network_en: He persistently asserted his right to a share in the heritage.
sentence.Network_cn: 他始终声称他有分享那笔遗产的权利.

PerfectNetExp.abs: assert 主张asserted 宣称的的assertion 主张
She asserted her belief that he was not guilty ., 她坚称她相信他是无罪的.

list.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... assert ? vt. 主张,声明,断言 assertive adj. 过分自信的，有进取心的 assess ? v. 估价，评价.
过度自信（Assertiveness）是你想询问和想告诉的程度，其实是衡量你自己影响他人的程度。如果你倾向于多告诉，那么你是属于很 …
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... assemble 集合; 装备 assert 断言;维护 assess 对…进行评估.
宣_百度百科 ... 宣布[ declare;proclaim;announce] 宣称[ assert;declare;profess] 宣传队[ propaganda team].
因为到处都是通过感觉、联想、类比而来的论断（assertion），而不是有逻辑力量的论证。比如他选定的26位文学大师中竟有弗洛伊 …

entry.def: If someone asserts a fact or belief, they state it firmly.

example.ex: Mr. Helm plans to assert that the bill violates the First Amendment...
example.tran: 赫尔姆先生打算声明该法案违反了宪法第一修正案。

example.ex: The defendants, who continue to assert their innocence, are expected to appeal...
example.tran: 各被告仍然坚称无辜，预计会提起上诉。

entry.def: If you assert your authority, you make it clear by your behaviour that you have authority.

example.ex: After the war, the army made an attempt to assert its authority in the south of the country...
example.tran: 战后，军队试图在该国的南部地区维护其统治地位。

example.ex: The people have asserted their power and that will be very difficult to reverse.
example.tran: 人民已经维护了其当家作主的权力，这将难以改变。

entry.def: If you assert your right or claim to something, you insist that you have the right to it.

example.ex: The republics began asserting their right to govern themselves.
example.tran: 各加盟共和国开始要求获得自治权。

entry.tran: 坚持（自己）的主张;表现坚定
entry.def: If you assert yourself, you speak and act in a forceful way, so that people take notice of you.

example.ex: He's speaking up and asserting himself confidently.
example.tran: 他明确表态，信心十足地阐述自己的观点。

auth_sentence.content: Because India is free and democratic, he asserted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Because India is free and democratic, he asserted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Because India is free and democratic, he asserted.

auth_sentence.content: Parliament had asserted an absolute lordship over the colonies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Parliament had asserted an absolute lordship over the colonies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Parliament had asserted an absolute lordship over the colonies.

auth_sentence.content: Justice O'Connor asserted that in order to assemble a class .
auth_sentence.res_content: Justice O'Connor asserted that in order to assemble a class .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Justice O'Connor asserted that in order to assemble a class .
